12 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testDefaultConstructor)
13 {
14  ASSERT_NO_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper());
15  TfRemapper* remapPointer;
16  ASSERT_NO_THROW(remapPointer = new TfRemapper());
17  delete remapPointer;
18 }

20 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testMappingsConstructor)
21 {
22  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
23  mappings["a"] = "b";
24  mappings["c"] = "d";
25  mappings["e"] = "";
26  TfRemapper remap;
27  EXPECT_NO_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings));
28  EXPECT_EQ(3, remap.getMappings().size());
29  EXPECT_EQ(mappings, remap.getMappings());
30 
31  std::map<std::string, std::string> reverseMappings;
32  reverseMappings["b"] = "a";
33  reverseMappings["d"] = "c";
34  TfRemapper reverseRemap;
35  EXPECT_NO_THROW(reverseRemap = TfRemapper(mappings, true));
36  EXPECT_EQ(2, reverseRemap.getMappings().size());
37  EXPECT_EQ(reverseMappings, reverseRemap.getMappings());
38 }

40 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testAllowsEmptyMappings)
41 {
42  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
43  TfRemapper remap;
44  EXPECT_NO_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings));
45  EXPECT_EQ(0, remap.getMappings().size());

48 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testAllMappingsAreCopied)
49 {
50  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
51  mappings["a"] = "ab";
52  mappings["c"] = "cb";
53  mappings["d"] = "db";
54  mappings["e"] = "eb";
55  const TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(mappings);
56  EXPECT_EQ(mappings, remap.getMappings());
57 }

59 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testThrowsOnEmptyOldAndNew)
60 {
61  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
62  mappings[""] = "";
63  TfRemapper remap;
64  EXPECT_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
65  EXPECT_EQ(0, remap.getMappings().size());

68 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testAllowsEmptyNew)
69 {
70  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
71  mappings["a"] = "";
72  TfRemapper remap;
73  ASSERT_NO_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings));
74  EXPECT_EQ(1, remap.getMappings().size());

77 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testRemapping)
78 {
79  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
80  mappings["a"] = "b";
81  mappings["d"] = "e";
82  TfRemapper remap;
83  ASSERT_NO_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings));
84  ASSERT_EQ(2, remap.getMappings().size());
85 
86  tf2_msgs::TFMessage message;
87 
88  // should remap to b->c
89  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf;
90  tf.header.frame_id = "a";
91  tf.child_frame_id = "c";
92  tf.header.seq = 19;
93  tf.header.stamp.sec = 20;
94  tf.header.stamp.nsec = 21;
95  tf.transform.translation.x = 1.0;
96  tf.transform.translation.y = 2.0;
97  tf.transform.translation.z = 3.0;
98  tf.transform.rotation.x = 4.0;
99  tf.transform.rotation.y = 5.0;
100  tf.transform.rotation.z = 6.0;
101  tf.transform.rotation.w = 7.0;
102  message.transforms.push_back(tf);
103 
104  // should remap to b->e
105  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf2;
106  tf2.header.frame_id = "b";
107  tf2.child_frame_id = "d";
108  message.transforms.push_back(tf2);
109 
110  // should not remap
111  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf3;
112  tf3.header.frame_id = "b";
113  tf3.child_frame_id = "c";
114  message.transforms.push_back(tf3);
115 
116  // should allow remapping to the same name
117  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf4;
118  tf4.header.frame_id = "c";
119  tf4.child_frame_id = "c";
120  message.transforms.push_back(tf4);
121 
122  tf2_msgs::TFMessage messageCopy = remap.doRemapping(const_cast<const tf2_msgs::TFMessage&>(message));
123  remap.doRemapping(message);
124 
125  ASSERT_EQ(4, message.transforms.size());
126 
127  EXPECT_EQ("b", message.transforms[0].header.frame_id);
128  EXPECT_EQ("c", message.transforms[0].child_frame_id);
129  EXPECT_EQ("b", message.transforms[1].header.frame_id);
130  EXPECT_EQ("e", message.transforms[1].child_frame_id);
131  EXPECT_EQ("b", message.transforms[2].header.frame_id);
132  EXPECT_EQ("c", message.transforms[2].child_frame_id);
133  EXPECT_EQ("c", message.transforms[3].header.frame_id);
134  EXPECT_EQ("c", message.transforms[3].child_frame_id);
135 
136  EXPECT_EQ(19, message.transforms[0].header.seq);
137  EXPECT_EQ(20, message.transforms[0].header.stamp.sec);
138  EXPECT_EQ(21, message.transforms[0].header.stamp.nsec);
139  EXPECT_EQ(1.0, message.transforms[0].transform.translation.x);
140  EXPECT_EQ(2.0, message.transforms[0].transform.translation.y);
141  EXPECT_EQ(3.0, message.transforms[0].transform.translation.z);
142  EXPECT_EQ(4.0, message.transforms[0].transform.rotation.x);
143  EXPECT_EQ(5.0, message.transforms[0].transform.rotation.y);
144  EXPECT_EQ(6.0, message.transforms[0].transform.rotation.z);
145  EXPECT_EQ(7.0, message.transforms[0].transform.rotation.w);
146 
147  ASSERT_EQ(4, messageCopy.transforms.size());
148 
149  EXPECT_EQ("b", messageCopy.transforms[0].header.frame_id);
150  EXPECT_EQ("c", messageCopy.transforms[0].child_frame_id);
151  EXPECT_EQ("b", messageCopy.transforms[1].header.frame_id);
152  EXPECT_EQ("e", messageCopy.transforms[1].child_frame_id);
153  EXPECT_EQ("b", messageCopy.transforms[2].header.frame_id);
154  EXPECT_EQ("c", messageCopy.transforms[2].child_frame_id);
155  EXPECT_EQ("c", messageCopy.transforms[3].header.frame_id);
156  EXPECT_EQ("c", messageCopy.transforms[3].child_frame_id);
157 
158  EXPECT_EQ(19, messageCopy.transforms[0].header.seq);
159  EXPECT_EQ(20, messageCopy.transforms[0].header.stamp.sec);
160  EXPECT_EQ(21, messageCopy.transforms[0].header.stamp.nsec);
161  EXPECT_EQ(1.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.translation.x);
162  EXPECT_EQ(2.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.translation.y);
163  EXPECT_EQ(3.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.translation.z);
164  EXPECT_EQ(4.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.rotation.x);
165  EXPECT_EQ(5.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.rotation.y);
166  EXPECT_EQ(6.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.rotation.z);
167  EXPECT_EQ(7.0, messageCopy.transforms[0].transform.rotation.w);
168 }

170 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testDelete)
171 {
172  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
173  mappings["a"] = "";
174  mappings["d"] = "e";
175  TfRemapper remap;
176  ASSERT_NO_THROW(remap = TfRemapper(mappings));
177  ASSERT_EQ(2, remap.getMappings().size());
178 
179  tf2_msgs::TFMessage message;
180 
181  // should be deleted
182  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf;
183  tf.header.frame_id = "a";
184  tf.child_frame_id = "c";
185  message.transforms.push_back(tf);
186 
187  // should remap to b->e
188  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf2;
189  tf2.header.frame_id = "b";
190  tf2.child_frame_id = "d";
191  message.transforms.push_back(tf2);
192 
193  // should not remap
194  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf3;
195  tf3.header.frame_id = "b";
196  tf3.child_frame_id = "c";
197  message.transforms.push_back(tf3);
198 
199  // should be deleted
200  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf4;
201  tf4.header.frame_id = "f";
202  tf4.child_frame_id = "a";
203  message.transforms.push_back(tf4);
204 
205  remap.doRemapping(message);
206 
207  ASSERT_EQ(2, message.transforms.size());
208 
209  EXPECT_EQ("b", message.transforms[0].header.frame_id);
210  EXPECT_EQ("e", message.transforms[0].child_frame_id);
211  EXPECT_EQ("b", message.transforms[1].header.frame_id);
212  EXPECT_EQ("c", message.transforms[1].child_frame_id);
213 }

216 {
217  int offset = 0;
218  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(
219  "<value>"
220  " <array>"
221  " <data>"
222  " <value>"
223  " <struct>"
224  " <member>"
225  " <name>new</name>"
226  " <value>ab</value>"
227  " </member>"
228  " <member>"
229  " <name>old</name>"
230  " <value>a</value>"
231  " </member>"
232  " </struct>"
233  " </value>"
234  " <value>"
235  " <struct>"
236  " <member>"
237  " <name>new</name>"
238  " <value>cb</value>"
239  " </member>"
240  " <member>"
241  " <name>old</name>"
242  " <value>c</value>"
243  " </member>"
244  " </struct>"
245  " </value>"
246  " <value>"
247  " <struct>"
248  " <member>"
249  " <name>new</name>"
250  " <value>db</value>"
251  " </member>"
252  " <member>"
253  " <name>old</name>"
254  " <value>d</value>"
255  " </member>"
256  " </struct>"
257  " </value>"
258  " <value>"
259  " <struct>"
260  " <member>"
261  " <name>new</name>"
262  " <value>eb</value>"
263  " </member>"
264  " <member>"
265  " <name>old</name>"
266  " <value>e</value>"
267  " </member>"
268  " </struct>"
269  " </value>"
270  " <value>"
271  " <struct>"
272  " <member>"
273  " <name>new</name>"
274  " <value>f</value>"
275  " </member>"
276  " <member>"
277  " <name>old</name>"
278  " <value>f</value>"
279  " </member>"
280  " </struct>"
281  " </value>"
282  " <value>"
283  " <struct>"
284  " <member>"
285  " <name>new</name>"
286  " <value></value>"
287  " </member>"
288  " <member>"
289  " <name>old</name>"
290  " <value>g</value>"
291  " </member>"
292  " </struct>"
293  " </value>"
294  " <value>"
295  " <struct>"
296  " <member>"
297  " <name>new</name>"
298  " <value>h</value>"
299  " </member>"
300  " <member>"
301  " <name>old</name>"
302  " <value></value>"
303  " </member>"
304  " </struct>"
305  " </value>"
306  " </data>"
307  " </array>"
308  "</value>", &offset);
309  std::map<std::string, std::string> mappings;
310  mappings["a"] = "ab";
311  mappings["c"] = "cb";
312  mappings["d"] = "db";
313  mappings["e"] = "eb";
314  mappings["f"] = "f";
315  mappings["g"] = "";
316  const TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings);
317  EXPECT_EQ(mappings, remap.getMappings());
318 
319  std::map<std::string, std::string> reverseMappings;
320  reverseMappings["ab"] = "a";
321  reverseMappings["cb"] = "c";
322  reverseMappings["db"] = "d";
323  reverseMappings["eb"] = "e";
324  reverseMappings["f"] = "f";
325  reverseMappings["h"] = "";
326  const TfRemapper reverseRemap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings, true);
327  EXPECT_EQ(reverseMappings, reverseRemap.getMappings());
328 }

330 TEST(tf_remapper_cpp, testXmlRpcValueConstructorThrowsOnInvalidData)
331 {
332  {
333  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(false);
334  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
335  }
336  {
337  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(1);
338  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
339  }
340  {
341  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(1.0);
342  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
343  }
344  {
345  struct tm time = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
346  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(&time);
347  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
348  }
349  {
350  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings("throw");
351  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
352  }
353  {
354  std::string data = "asd";
355  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings(static_cast<void*>(&data), data.size());
356  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
357  }
358  {
359  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
360  xmlRpcMappings["a"] = "b";
361  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
362  }
363  {
364  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
365  xmlRpcMappings[0] = "b";
366  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
367  }
368  {
369  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
370  xmlRpcMappings[0]["old"] = "";
371  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
372  }
373  {
374  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
375  xmlRpcMappings[0]["old"] = "";
376  xmlRpcMappings[0]["new"] = "";
377  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
378  }
379  {
380  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
381  xmlRpcMappings[0]["old"] = false;
382  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
383  }
384  {
385  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
386  xmlRpcMappings[0]["old"] = "a";
387  xmlRpcMappings[0]["new"] = "b";
388  xmlRpcMappings[0]["foo"] = "c";
389  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
390  }
391  {
392  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xmlRpcMappings;
393  xmlRpcMappings[0]["old"] = "a";
394  xmlRpcMappings[0]["new"] = "b";
395  xmlRpcMappings[1]["old"] = "";
396  EXPECT_THROW(TfRemapper remap = TfRemapper(xmlRpcMappings), ros::InvalidParameterException);
397  }
398 }
